Class PageRouter

java.lang.Object
application.framework.PageRouter
public class PageRouter extends Object
Handles page navigation in the application.

This class is responsible for scanning pages annotated with Route in the "application.pages" package, mapping them to the corresponding MyPages enum, and handling the navigation between pages.

Author:
Dhruv

  • Constructor Details

    • PageRouter

      public PageRouter(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Constructs a PageRouter with the given primary stage.

      This constructor initializes the primary stage and automatically registers all pages annotated with Route in the "application.pages" package.

      Parameters:
      primaryStage - The primary stage of the application.

  • Method Details

    • autoRegister

      private void autoRegister()
      Automatically registers pages annotated with Route from the "application.pages" package.

      This method uses the Reflections library to scan the package for classes with the Route annotation, mapping them to the corresponding MyPages enum value.

    • navigate

      public void navigate(MyPages page)
      Navigates to the specified page route.

      This method creates an instance of the page, initializes it with the primary stage, and shows the page. It also updates the current and previous pages for navigation history.

      Parameters:
      page - The MyPages enum value representing the page to navigate to.

    • getPreviousPage

      public MyPages getPreviousPage()
      Returns the previously visited page.
      Returns:
      The MyPages enum value representing the previous page, or null if no previous page exists.

    • getCurrentPage

      public MyPages getCurrentPage()
      Returns the currently displayed page.
      Returns:
      The MyPages enum value representing the current page.
